SELECT DISTINCT staff_id FROM ( SELECT projectId FROM mms_project_information
endTime >= CURRENT_DATE

) po_info LEFT JOIN ( SELECT project_id,
staff_id AS staff_id
backup_staff_id AS staff_id

mapper.select: SELECT mms_base_staff_info.costCenter as name, COUNT(*) AS number FROM () po_staff LEFT JOIN mms_base_staff_info ON po_staff.staff_id = mms_base_staff_info.employeeID WHERE po_staff.staff_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY mms_base_staff_info.costCenter

SELECT staff_info.po_role_id AS name, COUNT(*) AS number FROM ( SELECT projectId FROM mms_project_information
endTime >= CURRENT_DATE
#{poID}
) po_info LEFT JOIN ( SELECT project_id, po_role_id,
staff_id AS staff_id
backup_staff_id AS staff_id
FROM mms_po_staff_info ) staff_info ON po_info.projectId = staff_info.project_id WHERE staff_info.staff_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY staff_info.po_role_id

SELECT name, COUNT(*) AS number FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT
training_name AS name,
series AS name,
staff_id FROM () po_staff LEFT JOIN mms_course_test_score ON po_staff.staff_id = mms_course_test_score.employee_id LEFT JOIN mms_course_setting ON mms_course_test_score.opening_id = mms_course_setting.opening_id
po_staff.staff_id IS NOT NULL
AND mms_course_setting.series = #{series}
) temp GROUP BY name

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN birthdayDate >= #{age30} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS agelessthan30, SUM(CASE WHEN birthdayDate < #{age30} AND birthdayDate >= #{age40} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS age30to40, SUM(CASE WHEN birthdayDate < #{age40} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS agegreaterthan40 FROM () po_staff LEFT JOIN mms_family_information ON po_staff.staff_id = mms_family_information.employeeID WHERE po_staff.staff_id IS NOT NULL

SELECT employeeID AS staffID, employeeName AS staffName, costCenter AS costCenter, sex AS sex, cooperationMode AS cooperationMode, positionRole AS positionRole, employmentDate AS employmentDate, graduationTime AS graduationTime, education AS education, if211 AS if211 FROM mms_base_staff_info
#{staffID}

#{staffID}
